pages.text: In addition to the in-game configuration for the selected MIDI device and keybinds MIMI also includes a configuration file with several additional settings.$(br2)Like other mods, the configuration file for MIMI can be found in your Minecraft instance $(#0046ff)config$() folder and can be modified with any text editor or IDE.

pages.title: Default MIDI Device
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() defaultMidiInputDevice$(br)$(l)Type:$() Integer$(br)$(l)Default:$() -1$(br2)This parameter holds the device ID of the $(l:config_midi_input)system MIDI device$(/l) that should be used for MIMI input by default. If a value is set MIMI will attempt to use that device when Minecraft launches if it is available.$(br2)To have no default device set this to -1.

pages.title: Synth Jitter Correction
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() synthJitterCorrection$(br)$(l)Type:$() Boolean$(br)$(l)Default:$() true$(br2)This parameter sets whether the MIMI MIDI synthesizer should correct for jitter. Enabling jitter correction improves note timing accuracy in exchange for slightly increased latency.$(br2)It is recommended to keep this enabled unless you experience severe latency.

pages.title: Synth Baseline Latency
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() synthBaselineLatency$(br)$(l)Type:$() Integer$(br)$(l)Default:$() 250ms$(br2)This parameter sets the baseline latency of the MIMI MIDI synthesizer (in milliseconds). Smaller values will decrease the time it takes from a note to be played until you actually hear it, however this also shrinks the audio buffer size which can result in stuttering or complete silence in some cases.

pages.title: Synth Bitrate
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() synthBitRate$(br)$(l)Type:$() Integer$(br)$(l)Default:$() 16$(br2)This parameter sets the bitrate for the MIMI MIDI synthesizer (essentially how much data to generate per second of audio). Lower values might decrease audio stutter or latency but will also decrease audio quality.

pages.title: Synth Sample Rate
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() synthSampleRate$(br)$(l)Type:$() Integer$(br)$(l)Default:$() 44100$(br2)This parameter sets the sample rate for the MIMI MIDI synthesizer (essentially how many audio samples to capture per second). Lower values might decrease audio stutter or latency but will also decrease audio quality.

pages.title: Synth Soundfont
pages.text: $(l)Param:$() soundfontPath$(br)$(l)Type:$() File Path$(br)$(l)Default:$() unset$(br2)This parameter sets the full path on your system to a $(l:midi_soundfont)Soundfont$(/l) file that should be used by the MIMI MIDI synthesizer. If a soundfont is set it will be loaded and used for any $(l:midi_programs)GM MIDI program IDs$(/l) that it contains, while the built-in Soundfont will serve as a fallback.
